thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb hotel
thread.title_full: Superb hotel - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: EnglandLucky
title: Superb hotel
text:
We stayed here whilst a family member attended Charing Cross hospital rooms very clean the staff very polite and friendly the two managers David and Neil were fantastic gave us great advice as to where to eat and with taking the stress out of our visit.
So many thanks to both of them will definitely stay here for the follow up clinic appointments
Regards
Stevenbrailey
